short_summary: Purchase a contract for a vendor to service and refit the Canadian Coast Guard Ship CCGS Sir John Franklin.
description: Description from the government using local language.,, they want to rotate and maintain the ship, it should all be done between December 27th and January 22nd,, they also want to use a local contractor who serves in the region of origin of the Canadian Journey Region of Supply Area Western,, because all materials needed are packaged by the local Government organization, for the next $625 to $875 annually to save global environmental costs, they needed to have the contract procedures in place punctuallymicrocoordinate,",
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
================================================ Switzerland Energy Corporation

**Job Title**
------------------

F1782-23C094A - Sir John Franklin Alongside Refit

**Job Description**
--------------------

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires a contractor to carry out the alongside refit for its ship CGCS Sir John Franklin. 

**Tender Details**

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person**: Tracy Birtwistle (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Information**: tracy.birtwistle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Project Start Date**: December 26, 2023
* **Project End Date**: January 20, 2024
* **Area of Origin**: Western Canada
* **Sourcing Strategy**: Sourcing shall be limited to suppliers based within the Area of Origin (Western Canada).
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Information**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17400814?extsite=MTc0MDA4MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Document Information**
------------------------

* **Document Name**: F1782-23C094A - Sir John Franklin Alongside Refit
* **Document Reference Number**: WS4117095745- Doc4168118955
* **Amendment Number**: 5

**Contract Details**
----------------------

* **Contracting Period**: 2023-08-31 to 2024-04-30
* **Contract Category**: Goods and Services

**Note**

Please refer to Part 2 - Bidder Instructions for any further information. The bidders’ conference and site visit are both optional.

Your reworded entry should include the original details that the contractor gave. Please avoid arguing over extra or importainits, this turned out elegant, please do not add what is not important. If you have any questions feel free to ask me. 

 Always feel free to discuss before or after you make any changes.   Thank you very much for the hours of change making. Response format should be Markdown.  Format your final output as follows:Yu-Siku 델라는에 title가 없는시출 WowRegards
